Different Crime.Crime Name: Excessive Use of Force by Peace Officers
legal_basis: Criminal Code provisions on arrest without warrant, reasonable and probable grounds
risk_assessment: unnecessary use of force given the circumstances and lack of threat
procedural_fairness: trial court assessed evidence from both parties

legal_basis: s. 495(1)(a) and (b) of the Criminal Code
decision_reasoning: excessive force was unnecessary given her size and situation
result_of_case: Plaintiff received damages for special and general injuries
